meanings.definition: In a secondary manner or order.
meanings.sent1: She completed her homework secondarily after finishing her chores.
meanings.sent2: He secondarily checked his email after responding to urgent messages.
meanings.sent3: The cat secondarily chased the laser pointer after napping in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed secondarily, adding a pop of color to the garden.
meanings.sent5: The student secondarily reviewed the material before the exam, hoping to improve their grade.

meanings.sent1: The secondarily task could wait until the more urgent ones were completed.
meanings.sent2: She packed her bag, ensuring the secondarily items were included.
meanings.sent3: The secondarily cupcake in the bakery display looked lonely next to the decadent cakes.
meanings.sent4: His secondarily role in the play still added depth to the overall performance.
meanings.sent5: The secondarily character in the story unexpectedly became the hero in the end.
